reviews.review: Nobody plays as killer anymore, so it takes forever to find a game. But the frustrating thing is, the killer you're matched with either sucks, is throwing the game, or is so insanely good that you never stood a chance in the first place.
it is great, fantastic game! nothing that bad (except hackers) but that's the usual and of course the bugs but 9.5/10 game highly recommend

En 1670h de jeu j'ai encore beaucoup de strat et de composition de compÃ©tences a dÃ©couvrir sur se jeu avec un contenu trÃ¨s rÃ©gulier je ne suis absolument pas dÃ©Ã§u de mon achat ni du temps passÃ© a jouer...
es bueno el mejor juego que e jugado
alto juego

Re-reviewing the game at 1,000 hours played and Mid-Chapter Update 6.1.0. The day has come where meta perks have been greatly adjusted (mostly massive nerfs to Survivors) and Killers have gained considerable buffs. In terms of balance, it does feel like Survivor is reasonably harder to play now than before, but most of the Killer buffs in my view are justified and the game is still playable with friends. Wouldn't recommend Solo Queue to my worst enemies though.

Rubberbanding still exists, sad but it does seem to be less frequent. When this is completely resolved and the core game is actually fully reliably playable, I feel like the game is heading toward a good state. The grind for perks for existing players have been significantly reduced, but hard to say if it really is for newcomers. BHVR has committed to looking into item and add-on progression but so far, they have managed to deliver on some of the major promises they've made and for once, it does feel like there is hope for the game after it being stuck in a stagnant state for so long. It is a good time to give it a shot if you haven't played it before, but still be warned that the grind for perks is no small matter. 

I was pleasantly surprised to see that the incentive for playing lesser-populated side is 100% Bloodpoints, this essentially grants 4 stacks of WGLF/BBQ from before and that feels really good. You just get it for playing the side that needs more players at the moment. Also hoping this will encourage more people to play both sides and gain a better understanding of the struggles on each side, who knows. For the first time, I am willing to recommend this game to a newcomer.

JUEGAZO

After spending an extortionate amount of money on this game and its DLC's and pouring wasted hours of my life into it, I can officially say that I hate it. There are some good parts but if I could go back and make the decision not to play it, I would. I appreciate the potential the game has and original idea of it but the community is one of the most toxic I have ever come across and as an avid player of MMO's, that's saying something. I will still probably continue putting hours into it, purely out of spite at this point and because there's a small part of me that hopes one day things might change but for new players, do yourself a favour and quit while you're ahead. It's only downhill from here.

The games balance has always been a problem like it is with many multiplayer Vs games however ever since the changes made to matchmaking the balance has been flung out the window, One moment you go up against people your own skill level and have a fun round and then the next round you get totally obliterated. Let's also not forget the constant hackers and extremely toxic community who will just up and leave a round over the smallest thing and the constant bugs.
NICE GAME
This game is a great social experiment for letting you see what happens when you let chimpanzees and humans play online games together. 10/10, lots of delicious feces thrown.

This game lately has been constantly broken and the developers do not do anything to fix it. My fps keeps freezing up, my friends get into lobbies but I somehow get disconnected from the server, the game lags terribly, even when you have good internet, this is beginning to feel like a waste of money and from the looks of it, I will not be purchasing any more future chapters from this game until it is properly fixed and handled. Never in my life have I ever seen a game require so many patches and become suddenly broken after every update, Even the Nurse has become unplayable because they can not keep this game up in tip top shape, FIX YOUR GAME BEHAVIOUR OR YOU WILL BE LOSING A SUPPORTER AND CUSTOMER, again, I have never, EVER seen a game as broke as this. You all patch one thing and it breaks another, wtf????? >.>

UPDATE 6/22/2022

So now they wanna gut the game and make players work harder for perks and the bloody cosmetics, INTERESTING, (not). And for us players who have worked hard at this game for years, prestiging our characters, grinding, losing our items, add ons, and having our perks reset and our unique reward is just gonna be a little icon by our name to brag to new comers that we busted our butts off way before them, bloodpoints and time wasted, just to have this icon as our unique reward? I am seriously close to being done with this game, deleting it and just never playing it again. I regret ever dollar spent on this game now and this game is DOOKIE.
